name: Link2Gov Corporation
overview: Link2Gov Corporation provides customized electronic service applications for government agencies in the United States. The company offers Web payment applications for clients who prefer their payment site accessible through a unique URL, as well as offers and supports a line of point of sale solutions that enable client employees to perform real-time account authorizations. It also provides DATAPOINT transaction reporting that allows the user to generate transaction, batch, and refund reports to review and manage transaction history. In addition, the company offers convenient AutoPay and QuickPay programs through Web payment solutions to assist repeat purchase and subscription services based transactional applications that provide clients with the ability to present bills and enable their customers to make payments via the Internet. Further, it provides internal revenue service payment services, as well as facilitates the collection of real estate taxes, utility bills, vehicle registrations and drivers license renewals, parking tickets, traffic citations, tuition payments, court fees and fines, hunting and fishing licenses, and various business licenses. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee. As of November 18, 2005, Link2Gov Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Metavante Technologies, Inc.
